subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The English striker Wayne Rooney was cleared to participate in the World Cup in Germany after undergoing a CAT scan at a Manchester hospital, although he was not expected to take part unless England advances out of the first round, the BBC reported.
snippet: The English striker Wayne Rooney was cleared to participate in the World Cup in Germany after undergoing a CAT scan at a Manchester hospital, although he was not expected to take part unless England advances out of the first round, the BBC reported.
